cause.description:
This Cause is fixed on puttin' Firefly or Serenity back into the television. Hopefully Sci-fi or some one else could pick it up.
1. Return firefly to the cortex
2. Keep Flying
3. Find out about Blue Sun
4. Find out the preacher's past and what Inara is running from.
5. Develope River Tam's abilities.
cause.mission: Return Firefly to a television screen!
cause.name: Mighty Fine Shindig
